en-US.customMessage: Here is the core message. that can be overwritten in the theme
en-US.No products synchronized for this catego: No products synchronized for this category. Please come back while online!
en-US.Shopping cart is empty. Please add some: Shopping cart is empty. Please add some products before entering Checkout
en-US.Some of the ordered products are not ava: Some of the ordered products are not available!
en-US.Stock check in progress, please wait whi: Stock check in progress, please wait while available stock quantities are checked
en-US.There is no Internet connection. You can: There is no Internet connection. You can still place your order. We will notify you if any of ordered products is not avaiable because we cannot check it right now.
en-US.No such configuration for the product. P: No such configuration for the product. Please do choose another combination of attributes.
en-US.The system is not sure about the stock q: The system is not sure about the stock quantity (volatile). Product has been added to the cart for pre-reservation.
en-US.This feature is not implemented yet! Ple: This feature is not implemented yet! Please take a look at https://github.com/DivanteLtd/vue-storefront/issues for our Roadmap!
en-US.The product is out of stock and cannot b: The product is out of stock and cannot be added to the cart!
en-US.Product has been added to the cart!: Product has been added to the cart!
en-US.Internal validation error. Please check: Internal validation error. Please check if all required fileds are filled in. Please contact us on contributors@vuestorefront.io
en-US.Product {productName} has been added to: Product {productName} has been added to the compare!
en-US.Product {productName} has been removed f: Product {productName} has been removed from compare!
en-US.Product {productName} has been added to: Product {productName} has been added to wishlist!
en-US.Product {productName} has been removed f: Product {productName} has been added to wishlist!
en-US.Account data has successfully been updat: Account data has successfully been updated
en-US.Newsletter preferences have successfully: Newsletter preferences have successfully been updated
en-US.This feature has not been implemented ye: This feature has not been implemented yet. Please follow our Roadmap for the details
en-US.You have already subscibed our newslette: You have already subscibed our newsletter
en-US.Error while sending reset password e-mai: Error while sending reset password e-mail
en-US.Reset password feature does not work whi: Reset password feature does not work while offline!
en-US.This feature is not implemented yet :( N: This feature is not implemented yet :( Newsletter is on our roadmap - issue #200!
en-US.You have been successfully subscribed to: You have been successfully subscribed to our newsletter!
en-US.Product price is unknown, product cannot: Product price is unknown, product cannot be added to the cart!
en-US.Enter your email to receive instructions: Enter your email to receive instructions on how to reset your password.
en-US.We've sent password reset instructions t: We've sent password reset instructions to your email. Check your inbox and follow the link.
en-US.You must accept the terms and conditions: You must accept the terms and conditions.
en-US.Please check if all data are correct: Please check if all data are correct
en-US.We will send you the invoice to given e-: We will send you the invoice to given e-mail address
en-US.Phone number may be needed by carrier: Phone number may be needed by carrier
en-US.We will send you details regarding the o: We will send you details regarding the order
en-US.The new account will be created with the: The new account will be created with the purchase. You will receive details on e-mail.
en-US.Subscribe to the newsletter and receive: Subscribe to the newsletter and receive a coupon for 10% off
en-US.to find something beautiful for You!: to find something beautiful for You!
Type what you are looking for...
en-US.We use cookies to give you the best shop: We use cookies to give you the best shopping experience.
en-US.Sign up to our newsletter and receive a: Sign up to our newsletter and receive a coupon for 10% off!
